head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SOLOMON, MARTIN D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SOLOMON, MARTIN D.

block.p: SOLOMON-Martin D. Of Deer Park, NY, formerly of Long Beach, on August 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Diane. Loving father of Daniel, James and Bradley. Fond stepfather of Theresa and Matthew Martin. Cherished brother of Dorine Shanbron and brother-in-law, Barry Shanbron. Service was held on Wednesday, August 9, in Woodbury.

SOLOMON-Martin D. Of Deer Park, NY, formerly of Long Beach, on August 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Diane. Loving father of Daniel, James and Bradley. Fond stepfather of Theresa and Matthew Martin. Cherished brother of Dorine Shanbron and brother-in-law, Barry Shanbron. Service was held on Wednesday, August 9, in Woodbury.
